mapper.select: select r.record_no recordNo, r.course_no courseNo, r.user_no userNo, c.title, r.review, to_char(r.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, i.save_name saveName from course c, record r left outer join (select * from record_img where order_no = 0) i on r.record_no = i.record_no where r.course_no = c.course_no and r.user_no = #{userNo} order by r.reg_date asc

select c.course_no courseNo, c.user_no userNo, c.title, u.id, to_char(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, c.open_status openStatus from course c, users u where c.user_no = u.user_no and c.user_no = #{userNo} order by c.reg_date asc
select cate_no cateNo, user_no userNo, cate_name cateName from favorite_category where user_no = #{userNo} order by cate_no asc
